data.constraints:
0 < line length <= 100

Each line contains three, equal-length, space-separated strings:
• First string: 0s and 1s only
• Second string: letters only (uppercase or lowercase)
• Third string: letters only (uppercase or lowercase)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Reverse mode
Input
5 lines of characters
Output
Reverse mode
Constraints
0 < line length <= 100

Each line contains three, equal-length, space-separated strings:
• First string: 0s and 1s only
• Second string: letters only (uppercase or lowercase)
• Third string: letters only (uppercase or lowercase)
Example
Input
00000 AAAAA xxxxx
01110 BBBBB xxxxx
01110 CCCCC xxxxx
01110 DDDDD xxxxx
00000 EEEEE XXXXX
Output
AAAAA
BxxxB
CxxxC
DxxxD
EEEEE
